message: Let's be fair, Bob. I know the value decreases faster for you, so I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
Since the money is worth less to me with each passing round, I think this 55/45 split in my favor is a reasonable compromise.
Bob, let's be realistic. This is my final offer. You're losing value quickly. Take this 43/57 split or risk getting even less next round.
